help taptitans: this is the tap titans module
help: General help page. For all module listings and so on. Test live update.
help tt setinterval:
Set the interval for when the timer will ping users. This should be any number, from 1-60, in minutes only.

Requires: GM or Master ranks.

Example:
```
.tt setinterval 60 15 5 2 1
.tt setinterval 15,2,1```
help tt settext:
Set the text used for certain pings and information.

There are several template tags available: `{time}`, `{spawn}`, `{cq}`, `{round}`.

Requires: GM or master rank

Usage:`.tt settext <text_type> <text_content>`

Example:
```.tt settext timer {time} until boss #{cq} (at {spawn})```
